posts._title: Francesco Rosi – La Tregua AKA The Truce (1997)
posts.title: La Tregua
posts.excerpt: Based on Primo’s account of his liberation from Auschwitz and long journey home through a Europe caught between war and peace. The truce is not only an account of hardship and the rediscovering of humanity but of the relief, exuberance and comedy in a momentous journey after the most gruesome period of modern history.
